com.mickare.xserver.net

Interface XServer


  • public interface XServer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Try to establish a connection to this server
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect from this server
      void flushCache()
      Send cached packets = queue packets into connection
      java.lang.String getHost()
      Get the host/ip address
      XServerManager getManager()
      Get the Current Server Manager Object
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the Server Name
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Get the md5-encrypted password that is needed to login to this server
      int getPort()
      Get the port
      long getReceivinglastSecondPackageCount()
      Get the number of packages received in the last one second
      long getReceivingRecordSecondPackageCount()
      Get the record number of packages received in one second
      long getSendinglastSecondPackageCount()
      Get the number of packages sended in the last one second
      long getSendingRecordSecondPackageCount()
      Get the record number of packages sended in one second
      XType getType()
      Get the type of this server
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns the connection status
      void ping(Ping ping)
      Ping this server with a new Ping
      boolean sendMessage(Message message)
      Send a data Message to this server
      void setConnection(Connection con)
      Set the connection of this server
      void setReloginConnection(Connection con)
      Set the connection of this server on a rebouncing and successful Login Request (Dual Login, both servers needs to login on eachother)

        Returns:
